SCHOOL_NAME: Required. Must use either YYYYMMDD or DD/MM/YYYY
NHS_NUMBER: Required. Must be one of Not known, Male, Female, Not specified.
PERSON_FORENAME: Required. Must be a valid UK postcode
PERSON_SURNAME: Required. Must be HPV, ACWYX4, MenACWY, 3-in-1, or Td/IPV
PERSON_DOB: Required. Must use either YYYYMMDD or DD/MM/YYYY format
PERSON_GENDER_CODE: Optional. Must be a valid ODS code
PERSON_POSTCODE: Optional. Must be 6 digits and numeric. Use 888888 for school unknown and 999999 for homeschooled.
DATE_OF_VACCINATION: Optional. Must be 10 digits and numeric
VACCINE_GIVEN: Optional. Must be Cervarix, Gardasil, Gardasil9, MenQuadfi, Menveo, Nimenrix, or Revaxis
BATCH_EXPIRY_DATE: Optional. Must use either YYYYMMDD or DD/MM/YYYY
ANATOMICAL_SITE: Required only if VACCINE_GIVEN is omitted. Must be Y or N
PERFORMING_PROFESSIONAL_FORENAME: Optional. It must be appropriate for the vaccine delivery method and be one of: left arm (lower position), left arm (upper position), left buttock, left thigh, left upper arm, nasal, right arm (lower position), right arm (upper position), right buttock, right thigh or right upper arm
PERFORMING_PROFESSIONAL_SURNAME: Required only if VACCINATED is N. Must be absent from school, already had elsewhere, did not attend, refused, unwell or vaccination contraindicated
CONSENT_TYPE: Optional. Must be a number or 1B, 1P, 2B, 2P or 3P
LOCAL_PATIENT_ID_URI: Required only if CARE_SETTING is 2. Must be the name of a community clinic location
